Articles.Content:
Nop- *cough* yes, yes, I am...

The user below me fear Fallout brainbots.

no i just love shooting at them with a hate that is only equaled by my hate of dragons in skyrim

the user below me has skyrim

True

The user below doesn't know what F1 is

True

The user below knows about MiSsINg0

False.

The user below me is typing this in school.

False but you were, I assume.

The user below me hasn't bothered to go to Kerbin's poles.

Partly true. I have been at the north pole, but not at the south one.

The user below me likes turtles.

True! Doesn't everyone like turtles?

The user below me has never made a spaceplane

True, but I've never made a working SSTO.

The user below me has never made a space station.

IT'S TRUE!......

The user bellow me is neither a program nor user, but a cyborg dinosaur???

MaybeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦(Ok, i admit. Yes.)

The user below got stuckified in their own rocket.

NOPE.

The next user killed more Kerbals than recovered.

True, and I rigged the game so they stay dead.

The next user made no less than 5 attempts to land on the Mun in one piece.

True, but 3-5 were "rescue" missions.

The usage below me has attempted to make a Wackjob craft.

False... ish. I don't think my PC could take it, but I kind of made something Wackjobby to get to Eve in .18 (it was pretty huge).

The user below me has never put a station in orbit around any body other than Kerbin.

True, I tend to put up modules that are a bit big.

The next poster has never built a proper Aircraft.

False. I once built an ion powered airplane, and it was beautiful.

The user below me has landed on Pol.

Nope, never gone interplanetary, I'm such a noob...

The user below me already played Fallout.

True, but only from a friend's borrowed disk and on PS3. I need it for PC.

The user below me does not have KSP on Steam, only from the website.

Affirmative.

The user below wants 0.24 out.

True (I'm not alone with the whole non-steam business, eh?)

The user below me does not currently have a space station around Kerbin in their career save file.

CORRECT!

The user below me has not updated KSP yet.(for some weird reason)

Incorrect! Game over!

The user below me thinks Principia is a great project and can't wait for it to be playable.

Flase, what the heck that is?

The user below me has played METAL GEAR!

False

The user below me has played OpenTTD.
